text: (Zirikana) ubwo Umuhanuzi (Muhamadi) yabitsaga ibanga umwe mu bagore be (Hafsa), maze ubwo yarimenaga (aribwira mukeba we Ayisha), (Allah abihishurira Umuhanuzi) maze (Umuhanuzi) amenyesha (Hafsa) bimwe muri byo, ibindi arabireka. Nuko ubwo yabimubwiraga, (Hafsa) aravuga ati “Ni nde wakubwiye ibi?ˮ (Intumwa) iravuga iti “Nabibwiwe n’Umumenyi uhebuje, Uzi neza buri kintu.ˮ
